description:
Their new Premium 2.0 Heated Socks are powered by our Powersheer® Micro BT 3.7-Volt Lithium-Ion battery that provides long-lasting warmth for up to 10 hours on a single charge.

Their Premium 2.0 Merino Wool Heated Socks are a thoughtful blend of comfort and Fieldsheer’s® Mobile Warming® Technology. Since 1978 Fieldsheer has been designing and manufacturing rugged, performance-driven gear for avid outdoor enthusiasts, motorcyclists, workers, and more.

Thier Premium 2.0 Merino Heated Socks take all-day comfort to the next level. Whether you’re in deep backcountry powder or an early morning job site, keep your feet warm and improve circulation to avoid stiffness, muscle fatigue, and soreness. With heavy cushioning in key areas and heating elements under the front of the foot, you can avoid the discomfort and numbness that come with being outside in cold conditions. The Merino Wool blend is breathable, and the full-calf length provides comprehensive coverage. Seamless Bluetooth® connectivity powered by our proprietary MW Connect™ technology controls 4 heat settings, ensuring you maintain complete comfort and control.
name: Fieldsheer Canada Premium 2.0 Merino Heated Socks - Mens

specs.value: Charge time is based off using a USB-A wall charger that delivers 5V@2.1A
